import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import './styles.css' import border from '../img/border.png' import shoppingcart from '../img/shoppingcart.svg' import products from '../productslist' function ShoppingCartPage() { let bagItems = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("bagItems")) let bagNumber = parseInt(sessionStorage.getItem("bagNumber")) function removeItem() { if (bagNumber > 0) { bagNumber = bagNumber - 1 } sessionStorage.setItem("bagItems", JSON.stringify(bagItems)) if (bagItems == {}) { sessionStorage.removeItem("bagItems") } } function makeItems() { if (bagItems) { bagItems.map((indiv) => { return <>
  • {indiv.name}
    {indiv.description}
    {bagNumber[indiv.id]}
    {indiv.price}
    Adding to:
    {(indiv.price) / (bagNumber[indiv.id])}
    • }) } } return <>
      {makeItems}
      There's nothing here...
    } export default ShoppingCartPage
